channel.title: War Bush Business India Politics Politic on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: surprise surprise
item.description: It is interesting that when UN is trying to push weapons inspections and congress is giving all of our money to defense that the dow drops. I think that bush should hurry upwith this war. Do you think that anyone will stop bush? India is starting to withdraw from pakistani borders. COuld this be the desentegration of the powderkeg like climate the world is exhibiting? I doubt it :(whatever.. most of this is drivel.
